title: Ore no Kanojo to Osananajimi ga Shuraba Sugiru - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Ecchi   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Blackmail   Childhood Love   Clubs   Determined Protagonist   Love Triangles   Male Protagonist   Polygamy   Popular Love Interests
author: Yuuji Yuuji   裕時 悠示
description: Eita Kidō enters high school with the goal of graduating with marks high enough that he can earn a scholarship to medical school. With this goal in mind and the fact that his parents divorced, found other lovers and left him in the care of a relative, he shuns anything to do with romance or love. One day, the school beauty, Masuzu Natsukawa, invites him to walk home with her but he refuses. After several days he gives in and walks home with her. It turns out that Masuzu is tired of being the centre of attention and receiving confessions on a nearly-everyday basis, so she suggests that she and Eita become a fake couple. Although Eita tries to refuse, Masuzu blackmails him into becoming her boyfriend in name only. News of the new couple rapidly spreads throughout the school and Eita's childhood friend, Chiwa Harusaki, who likes him, begins to vie with Masuzu for Eita's affections.>
